name: Red Shield VPN
summary: VPN extension that actively disables competing proxy extensions via browser.management.setEnabled(). Uses encrypted DNS-over-HTTPS domain resolution with AES-256 encrypted DNS TXT records to discover API server. Uses externally_connectable with <all_urls> for subscription confirmations.

vulnerabilities.title: Proxy Extension Killing
vulnerabilities.description: Enumerates all extensions via management.getAll(), filters for proxy permission, and forcibly disables all competing proxy extensions.

flags.description: Uses management.getAll() to enumerate and disable all extensions with proxy permission
